libs.content:
find_library( ptex_library
        names
            ptex32 ptex32s ptex
        hints
            "${ptex_location}/lib"
            "$env{ptex_location}/lib"
        paths
            "$env{programfiles}/ptex/lib"
            /usr/lib
            /usr/lib/w32api
            /usr/local/lib
            /usr/x11r6/lib
            doc "the ptex library")

find_library( ptex_library
            names
                libptex.a
            paths
                "${ptex_location}/lib"
                "$env{ptex_location}/lib"
                doc "the ptex library")

find_library( ptex_library
            names
                ptex libptex.a
            paths
                "${ptex_location}/lib"
                "$env{ptex_location}/lib"
                doc "the ptex library")

find_library( ptex_library
        names
            ptex wdasptex
        hints
            "${ptex_location}/lib"
            "$env{ptex_location}/lib"
        paths
            /usr/lib
            /usr/local/lib
            /usr/openwin/lib
            /usr/x11r6/lib
            doc "the ptex library")

find_library( opencl_libraries
        names
            opencl
        doc "opencl lib for osx"
    )

find_library( opencl_libraries
        names
            opencl.lib
        paths
            env opencl_libpath
            "$env{atistreamsdkroot}/lib/x86_64"
            "$env{atistreamsdkroot}/lib/x86"
            "c:/program files (x86)/intel/opencl sdk/2.0/lib/x64"
            "c:/program files (x86)/intel/opencl sdk/2.0/lib/x86"
    )

find_library( opencl_libraries
        names
            opencl
        paths
            env ld_library_path
            env opencl_libpath
    )

find_program( rst2html_executable
    names
        rst2html.py
        rst2html
    doc
        "the python docutils restructuredtext to html converter"
)
find_library( metal_frameworks metal )

find_library(clew_library
  names
    clew clew
  paths
    ${_clew_search_dirs}
  path_suffixes
    lib lib64
  no_default_path
  doc "the clew library")

find_library(glew_library
        names
            glew glew glew32s glew32
        hints
            "${glew_location}/lib"
            "$env{glew_location}/lib"
        paths
            "$env{programfiles}/glew/lib"
            "${project_source_dir}/extern/glew/bin"
            "${project_source_dir}/extern/glew/lib"
        path_suffixes
            release/x86
        doc "the glew library")

find_library( glew_library
        names
            glew glew
        hints
            "${glew_location}/lib"
            "$env{glew_location}/lib"
        paths
            /usr/lib64
            /usr/lib
            /usr/lib/${cmake_library_architecture}
            /usr/local/lib64
            /usr/local/lib
            /sw/lib
            /opt/local/lib
            no_default_path
            doc "the glew library")

find_library( opengles_libraries
        names
            glesv2
        paths
            "${android_standalone_toolchain}/usr/lib"
    )
find_library( opengles_frameworks opengles )

find_library(dxsdk_${dx_lib}_library
            names 
                ${dx_lib}.lib
            paths
                ${library_dir}
            no_default_path
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library 
            names
                glfw32
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/x64"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
            paths
                "${opengl_library_dir}"
                /usr/lib
                /usr/lib/w32api
                /usr/local/lib
                ""
            doc 
                "the glfw library"
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library
            names 
                glfw32 
                glfw32s 
                glfw
                glfw3
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/x64"
                "${glfw_location}/lib-msvc110"
                "${glfw_location}/lib-vc2012"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib/x64"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib-msvc110"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib-vc2012"
            paths
                "$env{programfiles}/glfw/lib"
                "${opengl_library_dir}"
            doc 
                "the glfw library"
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library glfw
            names 
                glfw
                glfw3
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/cocoa"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib/cocoa"
            paths
                /usr/local/lib
        )

find_library( glfw_glfw_library
            names 
                glfw
                glfw3
            hints
                "${glfw_location}/lib"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib"
                "${glfw_location}/lib/x11"
                "$env{glfw_location}/lib/x11"
            paths
                /usr/lib64
                /usr/lib
                /usr/lib/${cmake_library_architecture}
                /usr/local/lib64
                /usr/local/lib
                /usr/local/lib/${cmake_library_architecture}
                /usr/openwin/lib
                ""
            doc 
                "the glfw library"
        )

find_library(tbb_${tbb_lib}_library
        names
            ${tbb_lib}
        hints
            "${tbb_location}/lib"
            "${tbb_location}/bin"
            "$env{tbb_location}/lib"
            "$env{tbb_location}/bin"
            "$env{programfiles}/tbb/lib"
            /usr/lib
            /usr/lib/w32api
            /usr/local/lib
            /usr/x11r6/lib
        path_suffixes
            ""
            "/${tbb_compiler}"
            "/gcc4.4"
            "/gcc4.1"
        doc "intel's threading building blocks library")
